sourcesContent: import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import img1 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-20.jpg' import img2 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-7.jpg' import img3 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-8.jpg' import img4 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-9.jpg' import img5 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-10.jpg' import img6 from '@Assets/images/banner/banner-11.jpg' const params = { spaceBetween: 30, centeredSlides: true, autoplay: { delay: 2500, disableOnInteraction: false }, pagination: { clickable: true }, navigation: true } const SwiperAutoplay = ({ isRtl }) => { return ( Autoplay ) } export default SwiperAutoplay
